name: Zyler
review: I've been visiting Beau Tribu for months now, and I have never had any issues. It can be a bit busy and sometimes there is a short wait, but that just goes to show how good they are.

name: M
review: I’ve been twice now and can say they are one of the best nails I have ever gotten. They last several weeks in between sets with no damage just minor paint chips. French tip is perfected everytime . Highly recommend!!!!

name: Cecilia A
review: I’ve been going to Beau Tribu for about a year now, and they always deliver top-quality service. Nam did my nails on my last visit. I went for BIAB with a nude chrome polish, and they turned out absolutely stunning! She really took her time prepping, shaping, and making sure the polish was perfectly even. I was so happy with how they came out. Honestly, this is the best nail salon in Bromley!

name: Victoria Wilkinson
review: As always, exceptional service, great experience all round! I’ve been going to Beau for years and for good reason! Everyone is warm, welcoming, friendly, fun and professional. Over the years I’ve had my nails done by everyone in Beau with a consistent result of beautiful quality nails.
